title: Red Potion
summaries: The Red Potion is a potion which can be found in Chests in drunk worlds (3.33*1/30 (3.33%) chance) and "For the worthy" worlds (10*1/10 (10%) chance). It can also be dropped by Jungle Mimics, which spawn in Celebrationmk10 worlds.
It inflicts the following debuffs for 1 hour / <abbr class="expert" title="Expert Mode">2 hours</abbr> / <abbr class="master" title="Master Mode">3 hours</abbr> on the player who consumed it:

Consuming a Red Potion in a "For the worthy" world will instead grant up to three of the following buffs (a random one is chosen for each checking, so one effect may be chosen multiple times, which results in fewer effects) for 30 minutes each.

statistics.Tooltip: 'Only for those who are worthy'
